DOC.brief_summary: This research study evaluate educational intervention woman experience change sexual function treatment ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Sexual Therapy Rehabilitation After Treatment Ovarian Cancer ( START-OC ) : A Pilot Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose research study effectiveness educational intervention woman experience change sexual function treatment ovarian cancer . The aim develop effective intervention help woman manage change restore sexual health functioning . This study consist attend group educational session follow one-on-one telephone counseling session .
DOC.criteria: Women diagnose Stage1IV ovarian cancer Prognosis least one year live ( assessed provider ) Endorsement least one sexual symptom ( see Appendix A eligibility screen ) English speaking Signed informed consent History pelvic radiation Cognitive impairment would interfere ability participate study ( assessed provider )
